declarations.description: A custom alert component for displaying messages with various alert types.
declarations.name: HaAlert

cssProperties.description: The primary text color used in the alert.
cssProperties.name: --primary-text-color

cssParts.description: The container for the alert icon.
cssParts.name: icon

cssParts.description: The container for the alert content.
cssParts.name: content

cssParts.description: The container for the alert actions.
cssParts.name: action

cssParts.description: The container for the alert title.
cssParts.name: title

slots.description: The main content of the alert.
Slot for providing a custom icon for the alert.
slots.name: icon

slots.description: Slot for providing custom actions or buttons for the alert.
slots.name: action

members.name: title
members.description: The title of the alert. Defaults to an empty string.

members.name: alertType
members.description: The type of alert to display. Defaults to "info". Determines the styling and icon used.

members.name: dismissable
members.description: Whether the alert can be dismissed. Defaults to `false`. If `true`, a dismiss button is displayed.

members.name: narrow
members.description: Whether the alert should use a narrow layout. Defaults to `false`.

events.description: Fired when the dismiss button is clicked.
events.name: alert-dismissed-clicked

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the alert. Defaults to an empty string.

attributes.name: alert-type
attributes.description: The type of alert to display. Defaults to "info". Determines the styling and icon used.

attributes.name: dismissable
attributes.description: Whether the alert can be dismissed. Defaults to `false`. If `true`, a dismiss button is displayed.

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: Whether the alert should use a narrow layout. Defaults to `false`.
